title: What font is this?

Please see attached file.

author: ckdundee

comments.content:
Close but i think the letter a is not quite the same.  
thanks
I’d go with Diavlo as well. Not sure how the crossbar on the t fell so far off the x-height though. Weird.
It \*is\* Diavlo, but the old one. In the new version the bars on the t (and f) have been raised.
